name: CorpoSzczury: Ultimate CV Battle Royale
description:
After graduating the college, friendship of two young men is about to become a ruthless competition when they realize that there might be only one who can achieve a great success in the labor market.

2 players game.
Control:

Player 1:

w - acceleration
q - interaction

Player 2:

p - acceleration
o - interaction

Game made by DaftMobile team:
-Anastasia Khlebous
-Joanna Markiewicz
-Jacek Dudzik
-Olaf Dygas
